sentences.sContent: Whether the reaction is exothermic or endothermic.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whether the reaction is exothermic or endothermic.
sentences.sCn: 反应是放热的还是吸热的。

sentences.sContent: Go from reactants to products, that becomes endothermic.
sentences.sContent_eng: Go from reactants to products, that becomes endothermic.
sentences.sCn: 从反应物到生成物的过程，是吸热的。

remMethod.val: endo(到…里面) + therm(热) + ic → 从里面散发热的 → 温血的， 恒温的

trans.tranOther: (of a chemical reaction or compound) occurring or formed with the absorption of heat
